Description

Here at Hillside paws for life we are a family run council licensed Dog Breeders in the lovely Derbyshire countryside.

Our Puppies are raised with great care and attention and we pride ourselves in creating the beat Puppies for Families like you. Please visit our website www.hillsidepawsforlife.co.uk to read about our 5* maternity ward. You can also visit our Youtube channel, Facebook and Instagram.

This is our adorable litter of Cockapoochon Puppies, Mum is Hallie our Poochon and Dad is our very well know Nugget who is a Toy Cockapoo and he is fully health tested. Mum and Dad are both lovely dogs with fantastic temperaments.
